other_title: Kakuriyo: Bed and Breakfast for Spirits
opening_theme: #1: "Tomoshibi no Manimani (灯火のまにまに)" by Nao Touyama (eps 1-9, 11-14)
#2: "Utsushiyo no Yume (ウツシヨノユメ)" by nano (eps 15-26)
ending_theme: #03: "Toki no Suna (時の砂)" by Akatsuki (Yuuma Uchida) & Suzuran (Maaya Uchida) (ep 5)
#04: "My sweet sweet love" by Byakuya (Atsushi Tamaru) (ep 8)
#06: "Utsushiyo no Yume (ウツシヨノユメ)" by nano (ep 14)
#07: "Shiranai Kimochi (知らない気持ち)" by Megumi Nakajima (eps 15-17, 19-20, 22, 24, 26)
#08: "Yashiho no Hana (ヤシホノハナ)" by Hatori (Takuma Terashima) (ep 18)
#09: "Koi Mamori Uta (恋守唄)" by Hideyoshi (Tetsuya Kakihara) (ep 21)
#10: "Setsuna no Kirameki (刹那の煌めき)" by Raijuu (Satoshi Hino) (ep 23)
#11: ''Eien no Kizuna (永遠の絆)'' by Ranmaru (Kaito Ishikawa) (ep 25)
